channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Engineering Blog

item.title: Setting up the new Raspberry Pi 4 with Ansible
item.description: Since June 2019 the new Raspberry Pi 4 is available to buy. It features much more memory (up to 4 GiB), a Gigabit Ethernet port and two USB 3 ports. So there is a lot of power to compute with, but before we can start playing with it, we have to set it up. One more thing to say: I don’t want to manage my Pi by CLI but with Ansible.
